doc.title: Daddy Doesn't Know
doc.plot: Bob Osborne thinks he has the perfect family, a beautiful wife Helen, and two well-behaved teens, son Dale and daughter Sheri. But there are things Daddy Doesn't Know. When he goes off to work it's Family Gone Wild. The morning sex he had with Helen isn't enough to keep her happy until he returns home. By noon she's in a lesbian tryst with friend Brook, a liaison which turns into a three-way when Brook introduces Paul. Meanwhile Sheri hooks up with her friend Brandi in the hot tub. Later they pair up with two guys on the pool table. Dale has a Summer job doing yard work for Mrs. Miller, the milf neighbor, but spends most of his time working on her backdoor. Dale and Sheri even find time for some incestuous afternoon delight, witnessed by Helen, who shrugs her shoulders. Mommy doesn't care, but they'll all be present for dinner as the perfect family so Daddy Doesn't Know.
